name: trip_start
description: The initial time of the voyage, when the vessel leaves port.

name: trip_end
description: The final time of the voyage, when the vessel reaches port.

name: trip_start_anchorage_id
description: The id of the anchorage where the voyage starts.

name: trip_end_anchorage_id
description: The id of the anchorage where the voyage ends.

name: trip_start_visit_id
description: The id of the visit where the voyage starts.

name: trip_end_visit_id
description: The id of the visit where the voyage ends.

name: trip_id
description: A unique identifier for the trip generated by the ssvid and the exit time.

name: vessel_ids
description: A list of all the vessel-ids related to the MMSI.
